title: NO level up capsule
body: Yesterday i leveled up and didn't receive a level up capsule for it? is this normal after level 40?

replies.body: Level 40 is meant to be a bigger reward actually! No worries though, I'm able to see which ones were added and which weren't, so you should be able to check your loot shortly and see that capsule waiting to be opened ^_^
I think I replied to you on another thread, I never got my level 40 either but got my level 41. That should be easy enough to notice if I missed due to a missing emote :(

No worries, though this specific case is pretty weird since you did get the 41 capsule and not the 40 milestone. Double check your loot for that capsule now though!

In the future be sure to make your own post for the best chances of getting our attention!

im sure you are tired of hearing this, but i just missed my 43 capsule, but i don't know what other capsules i missed, but i feel like i may have lost others as well...

EDIT: i relaunched the client and got the 43, but i may be missing others still.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=mTarXnpg,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-11-28T02:09:49.132+0000)
>
> No worries, though this specific case is pretty weird since you did get the 41 capsule and not the 40 milestone. Double check your loot for that capsule now though!
> 
> In the future be sure to make your own post for the best chances of getting our attention!

This happened to me yesterday at level 34, I still don't have it.
Will do! It is there now and thanks a lot for the quick response!
it happened to me, it is a bug.
